name: A.A.A.A.A.A.A.
description:
An Amazingly Automaton Assisted Alchemical Assembly Apparatus!!

Play as the proud doctor along side his amazing automatons.  Feed the Alchemical Assembly Apparatus various garbage to keep the experiment going. 

Player Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space bar to redirect good bots and to attack bad bots

Description:

  • Your automatons are always willing to help out in the lab...they are also idiots. Using your automatons, match the generated formula every round. If an automaton tries to submit the wrong item, use space bar to redirect him to the trash. If any rouge automatons show up attack them in similar fashion...really set an example.
  • 10 wrong items or 10 Bad Bot hits and its game over. 

2 Man Development Team:

Music and Programming:

Mark Porter

https://madog-porter.itch.io/

Artwork:

Lemonthunder
